content.text:
# Sports Betting & Market Making - Task File

This file contains tasks for NBA/MLB sports betting model development and market making research.

---

## Active Tasks
- [x] Create sports betting project structure and initialize database
- [x] Test NBA data pipeline and verify database connection
- [ ] Pull historical NBA player stats (2020-2025 seasons)
- [ ] Implement feature engineering for NBA player props
- [ ] Build baseline model for NBA points prop predictions
- [ ] Implement walk-forward backtesting framework
- [ ] Set up live data pipeline for current season data
- [ ] Create sports betting dashboard
- [ ] Study market making fundamentals (liquidity provision, bid-ask spread)
- [ ] Analyze betting market inefficiencies and edges
- [ ] Build inventory risk models for multiple positions
- [ ] Research optimal bet sizing (Kelly criterion, fractional Kelly)
